tags: Explanation of the health issue,Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was recommended Dr. Kundu by a neighbour. I was suffering from a toothache at two places for quite a long time. I consulted other doctors (before Dr. Kundu) but they could not explain the problem to me. When I finally visited Dr. Kundu I was extremely relieved to know the problem. Dr. Kundu made sure that I understand the problem and the root cause of the ache. He gives ample time to each of his patients. My one tooth needed a filling, which he did. One remarkable aspect of Dr. Kundu needs to be mentioned. My other tooth was bit critical. Of course an RCT is a solution, but also expensive. So he first tried with a filling, so that the treatment gets economical for me, but when the filling didn't work, he did the RCT, but adjusted the fee for the fillling! This is what I really liked about him. Unlike many doctors, he really thinks about the money aspect from the patient point of view. Coming to the surgery, he is immensely expert at his job. I wish I could show my tooth cap. There was no pain at all throughout the process. And the cap is so nicely made and fit  even I cannot make out which one is original and which one is the cap. Not to forget, the comfort of the cap, which feels like a natural teeth. Overall I would highly recommend Dr. Kundu for any dental issue, ** ** ** *** **** * **** **** ******* but also a very good human being. God bless him !

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Visited Dr.Ritesh for my 5 year old daughter. This is after I visited another doctor who suggested expensive treatements. Extremely happy with the way he explained all the issues and more importantly comforted the little child.  Very very genuine  in his advice and no unnecessary or expensive recommendations.  He said his first approach is to not make the child go through unnecessary pain through complicated procedures when they are not required ( as suggested by other doctors) . Honestly, super happy to have met him. I highly recommend anybody looking for any kind of dental treatment for children to visit him once. I bet you'll never need to go anywhere.  Thanks a lot Dr.Kundu for your valuable and genuine advice.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: My wife has dental issues since last 50 years. The problems are, reapted caries in different teeth, calcium deposits in Gums. Gums decay etc. These problems required constant followup and check up with Dental surgeon very often. But since last 5 years when we visited Dr. Kundu in his new town chamber for her treatment under him her condition has improved so much that she now hardly requires any consultation. I do get treament for some caries in my  teeths. His treatment of filling are painless and long lasting. We now can't think of any other Doctor. We are highly satisfied with treatment Dr. Kundu. I have recommended atleat 8 persons from our society and neighbourhood to get treatment under Dr. Kundu. Their feedbacks are also excellent. We are lucky to have such a Dr. In Newtown.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Tooth Coloured Fillings,Dental X-Ray,Mouth Bleed,
review:
Dr. Ritesh kundi is an exemplary new age, modern medical professional as a Dentist. He should be cited as an instance In the medical fraternity as how a Doctor should reach out and communicate and treat his patients. His confidence, compassion, empathetic treatment *** *** ** ****** *** ******* ********* ** *** ******* *** *** ********* ***** *** ****** *** ** *** **** ******* ** *** *****

I took my mother who was suffering from tooth ache due to cavity, the on spot digital X-Ray which he hosts and the diagnosis and his initial treatment proved to be quite an effective procedure to end the gruesome pain which was badly affecting my mother's health and lifestyle. The procedure is still underway for the wholistic approach and I'm sure future sittings will permanently fix all the tooth decay and other related problems for my mother. God bless him and his family. We need Heroes like him in our society üôè
